metadata.Title: CVE-2024-26327

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Server Applications 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Real Time 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP1

SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5

metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in QEMU 7.1.0 through 8.2.1. register_vfs in hw/pci/pcie_sriov.c mishandles the situation where a guest writes NumVFs greater than TotalVFs, leading to a buffer overflow in VF implementations.
